name: Survive... Or Die (Ludum Dare Edition)
description:
Survive or Die - Ludum Dare 50

You're being chased by hordes of rangers and vampires. You have to dodge them and stay alive for as long as you can. Optional challenge: Activate the tower in the northeast. There are a bunch of things that can help you survive!

Arrow keys to move

SPACE key to talk to NPCs

Play the new post-Ludum edition!
